inclusion.criterion: sepsis or septic shock upon admission
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: no previous diagnosis of diabetes mellitus
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He has no other underlying disease

exclusion.criterion: admission hypoglycemia (blood glucose levels below 70 mg / dL)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients who were given insulin or intravenous glucose before the first ICU blood glucose measured level
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has symptoms of vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. He ate a salad at a restaurant prior to his diarrhea onset.
